EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Practice Privileges Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Congratulations! You’re on your way to practice growth
Dear John Smith We are looking forward to sharing the benefits of PracticePrivileges with you on Friday, March 24, 2014 at The Renaissance Denver. We will begin our presentation at 6:30PM.
If you have any questions, please contact Nathaly Ambos at nambos@clearchoice.com or call 720-456-0408. Thank you and we will see you soon!
ClearChoice Holdings, LLC 8350 E. Crescent Parkway, Suite 100 Greenwood Village, CO 80111 800-617-0705
